org.fcrepo.kernel.services

Class LowLevelStorageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.LowLevelStorageService

  • @Component
public class LowLevelStorageService
extends Object
    Service for managing access to low-level binary blobs (which may include redundant copies, etc)
    Author:
    Chris Beer

      • transformLowLevelCacheEntries

        public <T> Collection<T> transformLowLevelCacheEntries(javax.jcr.Node resource,
                                              com.google.common.base.Function<LowLevelCacheEntry,T> transform)
                                            throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Apply some Function to the low-level cache entries for the Node
        Parameters:
        resource - a JCR Node containing a jcr:data binary property (e.g. a jcr:content node)
        transform - a Function to transform the cache entries with
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if the jcr:data property isn't found, a RepositoryException is thrown

      • transformLowLevelCacheEntries

                                              com.google.common.base.Function<LowLevelCacheEntry,T> transform)
        Apply some Function to the low-level cache entries for the binary property
        Parameters:
        jcrBinaryProperty - a binary property (e.g. jcr:data)
        transform - a Function to transform the underlying cache entry with

        Apply some Function to the low-level cache entries for a BinaryKey in the store
        Parameters:

        transform - a Function to transform the underlying cache entry with

      • getLowLevelCacheEntries

        public Set<LowLevelCacheEntry> getLowLevelCacheEntries(javax.jcr.Node resource)
                                                throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Get the low-level cache entries for a Node containing a jcr:data binary property
        Parameters:
        resource - a JCR node that has a jcr:data property.
        Returns:
        a map of binary stores and input streams
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if the jcr:data property isn't found, a RepositoryException is thrown

      • getLowLevelCacheEntries

        Get the low-level cache entries for a JCR Binary property
        Parameters:
        jcrBinaryProperty - a JCR Binary property (e.g. jcr:data)
        Returns:
        a map of binary stores and input streams

      • getClusterResults

        public <T> Set<T> getClusterResults(org.modeshape.jcr.value.binary.infinispan.InfinispanBinaryStore cacheStore,
                           org.modeshape.jcr.value.BinaryKey key,
                           com.google.common.base.Function<LowLevelCacheEntry,T> transform)
                         throws InterruptedException,
                                ExecutionException
        Get the transform results in a clustered Infinispan binary store
        Parameters:
        cacheStore - the Modeshape BinaryStore to use
        key - the BinaryKey we want to transform
        transform - the Function to apply
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException
